JPN2200 - Intermediate Japanese Language.name: JPN2200 - Intermediate Japanese Language and Civilization I

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: This course aims to aid in acquiring and refining the acquisition of the four skills in modern Japanese: speaking, listening, reading, and writing. The emphasis is on accurate communication in Japanese. The culture of Japan will also be studied.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures

JPN2201 - Intermediate Japanese Language.name: JPN2201 - Intermediate Japanese Language and Civilization II

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Continuation of JPN 2200 with emphasis on Japanese civilization.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures

JPN1120C - Elementary Japanese Language.name: JPN1120C - Elementary Japanese Language and Civilization I

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Introduces the student to Japanese culture through the major language skills: listening, speaking, reading and writing. Open only to students with no experience in the language.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures

JPN1121C - Elementary Japanese Language.name: JPN1121C - Elementary Japanese Language and Civilization II

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures
